subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers entered Saturday’s game with a 7-1-0 record in away games against Western Conference teams, but Mike Ribeiro’s third-period goal gave Nashville a 3-2 victory.
snippet: The Rangers entered Saturday’s game with a 7-1-0 record in away games against Western Conference teams, but Mike Ribeiro’s third-period goal gave Nashville a 3-2 victory.
